name: Treasure Hunter (itch) (Artur Nista)
description:
Explore the old Castle full of forgotten treasures laying around, ready to be grabbed by the first Treasure Hunter to arrive, and you hope to be the first!

Find and grab treasures

There are treasures laying around, ready to be grabbed

Don't waste time and go catch them. And don't forget to stay curious, as there are plenty of hidden ones, so look for secret entrances, holes and chests

A fun Hookshot mechanic

Use your hookshot to explore the castle and grab items

The secrets are there, you just need to find them

Maybe you can find other usages for it too

Make some friends

Though this is not mandatory

No jumpscares
